sentences.sContent: Others — cosmology, for example — make hypotheses that are more remote from everyday causes, and involve a high level of mathematical abstraction and idealization.
sentences.sContent_eng: Others — cosmology, for example — make hypotheses that are more remote from everyday causes, and involve a high level of mathematical abstraction and idealization.
sentences.sCn: 另外一些——比如说宇宙学——则对远离日常生活的一些事情做出假设，然后通过很高级的数学技巧加以抽象和理想化。
